Plot: Alex, a hit man, tries to get out of the family business, but his father won't let him do so. While seeking the help of a therapist, he meets a sexually charged 23-year-old woman with whom he falls in love.
Title: Panic
Actors: William H. Macy, John Ritter, Neve Campbell, Donald Sutherland
tomatoConsensus: This quirky little film about a gangster in therapy feels fresh and well-crafted.
